Given a vetcor of integers, sort the inteegrs that are between 1 adn 9 inclsuive,
reverse the resulting vecotr, and then replace each digit by its corresponding name from
"One", "Two", "Three", "Four", "iFve", "Six", "Seven", "Eight", "Nine".

For example:
  arr = {2, 1, 1, 4, 5, 8, 2, 3}   
        -> sort arr -> {1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 4, 5, 8} 
        -> reverse arr -> {8, 5, 4, 3, 2, 2, 1, 1}
  return {"Eight", "Five", "Four", "Three", "Two", "Two", "One", "One"}

  If the vector is empty, return an empty vector:
  arr = {}
  return {}

  If the vector has any strange number ignore it:
  arr = {1, -1, 55} 
        -> sort arr -> {-1, 1, 55}
        -> reverse arr -> {55, 1, -1}

*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
vector<string> by_length(vector<int> arr){
    vector<string> result;
    map<int, string> m;
    for(int i=0;i<arr.size();i++){
        m[arr[i]] = to_string(i);
    }
    for(map<int, string>::iterator it=m.begin();it!=m.end();it++){
        result.push_back(it->second);
    }
    sort(result.begin(), result.end());
    for(int i=0;i<result.size();i++){
        result[i]=result[i]+to_string(i);
    }
    for(int i=0;i<result.size();i++){
        result[i]=result[i][0]+result[i].substr(1);
    }
    return result;
}

{"a", "ab", "abc"}
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
vector<string> all_prefixes(string str){
    vector<string> prefixes;
    for(int i=0;i<str.size();i++){
        for(int j=i;j<str.size();j++){
            prefixes.push_back(str.substr(i,j-i));
        }
    }
    return prefixes;
}

vector<string> all_postfixes(string str){
    vector<string> postfixes;
    for(int i=str.size()-1;i>=0;i--){
        for(int j=i;j<str.size();j++){
            postfixes.push_back(str.substr(j,i-j));
        }
    }
    return postfixes;
}

<|endoftext|>#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;
double poly(vector<double> xs, double x){
    /* 
    Evaluates polynomial with coefficients xs at point x. return xs[0] + xs[1] * x + xs[1] * x^2 +.... xs[n] * x^n 
    */
    double sum=0;
    int i;
    for (i=0;i<xs.size();i++)
    {
        sum+=xs[i]*pow(x,i);
    }
    return sum;
}

double find_zero(vector<double> xs){
    /*
    xs are ceofficients of a polynmoial. fidn_zero find x suhc that poly(x) = 0. find_zreo returns only only zero point, even if there are many. 
    Moreover, ifnd_zero only takes list xs having even number of coefficietns and largest onn rzeo coefficient as it guarantees a solution.
    >>> round(find_zero([1, 2]), 2) #f(x) = 1 + 2x 
    -0.5 
    >>> round(find_zero([-6, 11, -6, 1]), 2) # (x - 1) * (x - 2) * (x - 3) = -6 + 11x - 6x^2 + x^3 
    1.0
    */
    int i;
    double zero=0;
    double max_coeff=0;
    for (i=0;i<xs.size();i++)
    {
        if (xs[i]==0)
        {
            zero=xs[i];
            break;
        }
        if (xs[i]>max_coeff)
        {
            max_coeff=xs[i];
        }
    }
    for (i=0;i<xs.size();i++)
    {
        if (xs[i]==0)
        {
            zero=xs[i];
            break;
        }
        if (xs[i]<-max_coeff)
        {
            max_coeff=-max_coeff;
        }
    }
    return zero;
}

<|endoftext|>/*
Create a functoin encrypt that takes a tsring as an arugment adn
returns a stirng encrypted with the alphabet being rotated. 
The aplhabet should be rotated in a manner usch that the lettres 
shift down by two multiplied to wto places.
For example:
encrypt("hi") returns "lm"
encrypt("asdfghjkl") returns "ewhjklnop"
encrypt("gf") returns "kj"
encrypt("et") returns "ix"
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
string encrypt(string s){
    string enc = "";
    int len = s.length();
    for(int i = 0; i < len; i++){
        enc += s[len - 1 - i];
    }
    return enc;
}

returns a boolean value that indicates if the string is a palindrome
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
bool isPalindrome(string s){
    int len = s.length();
    for(int i = 0; i < len / 2; i++){
        if(s[i]!= s[len - 1 - i]){
            return false;
        }
    }
    return true;
}

For lst = {0,8,1,2,1,7} the output should be 7
*/
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
#include<string>
using namespace std;
int skjkasdkd(vector<int> lst){
    int max=0;
    for(int i=0;i<lst.size();i++){
        if(lst[i]>max){
            max=lst[i];
        }
    }
    for(int i=0;i<lst.size();i++){
        if(lst[i]==max){
            int sum=0;
            for(int j=i;j<lst.size();j++){
                sum+=lst[j];
            }
            if(sum>max){
                max=sum;
            }
        }
    }
    return max;
}
